title: Tommy Little leaves Carrie Bickmore shocked with his cruel Halloween costume suggestion
text:
Tommy Little couldn't resist taking a light-hearted swipe at Carrie Bickmore during Wednesday's episode of The Project.

Discussing Halloween costume ideas, the 34-year-old comedian suggested the 38-year-old mum-of-three should just take her kids trick or treating without makeup.

'I suggested an outfit for Carrie, which might be too scary. I just suggested she go trick or treating without makeup,' joked Tommy on the TV program.

Scroll down for video

He said what? The Project's Carrie Bickmore is left shocked by co-host Tommy Little's Halloween costume suggestion for her

His cruel comment left Carrie with her mouth gaping wide open.

The show's panel were in the middle of an interview with dedicated Halloween fan, Bronwyn Goulding.

Carrie told Bronwyn she was celebrating her first Halloween this year, after having previously always worked on the spooky holiday.

Spooky: Discussing Halloween costume ideas, Tommy Little suggested the 38-year-old mum-of-three should just take her kids trick or treating without makeup

'I suggested an outfit for Carrie, which might be too scary. I just suggested she go trick or treating without makeup,' joked Tommy, leaving Carrie outraged

She said she was planning on dressing up as Alan from The Hangover, complete with a baby strapped to the front of her chest.

Speaking to Bronwyn, Carrie asked the 'Halloween fanatic' if she thought it would be an appropriate costume, when Tommy interjected with his suggestion.

'That's mean,' concluded Bronwyn, after first having a good laugh.

Rough day: Earlier in the day, Tommy took to Instagram to share a photo of Carrie in the radio studio holding an ice pack to her head, captioning it: 'Girls gone mild'

But it's unlikely the funnyman meant for his comment to be hurtful, with the two sharing a brother and sister style relationship.

In addition to being good friends and Project co-panelists, Carrie and Tommy also host a Hit FM radio show together.

Earlier in the day, Tommy took to Instagram to share a photo of Carrie in the radio studio holding an ice pack to her head, captioning it: 'Girls gone mild.'
description: Tommy Little couldn't resist taking a swipe at Carrie Bickmore during Wednesday's episode of The Project. Discussing Halloween costumes, Tommy suggested Carrie simply wear no makeup.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
